alert.note: Alert for Bon Homme; Clay; Hanson; Hutchinson; Lincoln; McCook; Turner; Union; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued July 12 at 3:38AM MDT until July 12 at 7:00AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 475 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 8 AM CDT THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN IOWA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 COUNTIES IN NORTHWEST IOWA CHEROKEE O`BRIEN PLYMOUTH SIOUX IN WEST CENTRAL IOWA IDA WOODBURY IN NEBRASKA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST NEBRASKA DAKOTA DIXON IN SOUTH DAKOTA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 9 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST SOUTH DAKOTA BON HOMME CLAY HANSON HUTCHINSON LINCOLN MCCOOK TURNER UNION YANKTON THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALCESTER, ALEXANDRIA, ALLEN, AVON, BATTLE CREEK, BERESFORD, BRIDGEWATER, CANISTOTA, CANTON, CENTERVILLE, CHANCELLOR, CHEROKEE, CLAYTON, ELK POINT, EMERY, FREEMAN, HARRISBURG, HARTLEY, HAWARDEN, HOLSTEIN, HULL, HURLEY, IDA GROVE, IRENE, JEFFERSON, LE MARS, LENNOX, MARION, MENNO, MONTROSE, NORTH SIOUX CITY, ORANGE CITY, PARKER, PARKSTON, PONCA, ROCK VALLEY, SALEM, SANBORN, SCOTLAND, SHELDON, SIOUX CENTER, SIOUX CITY, SOUTH SIOUX CITY, SPRINGFIELD, TABOR, TEA, TRIPP, TYNDALL, VERMILLION, VIBORG, WAKEFIELD, AND YANKTON.

area.areaDesc: Bon Homme; Clay; Hanson; Hutchinson; Lincoln; McCook; Turner; Union; Yankton
